solution_line_template: He gave Manny {manny_fraction} x {total_packs} = <<{manny_fraction}*{total_packs}={manny_packs}>>{manny_packs} packs of marbles.
And, Neil received {neil_fraction} x {total_packs} = <<{neil_fraction}*{total_packs}={neil_packs}>>{neil_packs} packs of marbles.
Thus, Leo. gave a total of {manny_packs} + {neil_packs} = <<{manny_packs}+{neil_packs}={total_given_packs}>>{total_given_packs} packs of marbles.
Therefore, Leo kept {total_packs} - {total_given_packs} = <<{total_packs}-{total_given_packs}={packs_kept}>>{packs_kept} packs of marbles.
